decision_conditions: It has not been demonstrated that the proposal would comply with Condition A.3 (a) (materials used in any exterior work shall be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse) of Class A, Part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Notwithstanding the above reason for refusal, due  to the submission of inconsistent and contradictory plans Officers are unable to fully assess the impact of the proposed development on the neighbouring amenities  of the host dwelling or the immediate surrounding area. The applicant has therefore failed to demonstrate, through the submission of cogent information, that the proposed development would not have an unacceptable adverse impact in terms of character and appearance, in conflict with Policy D3 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies CSS8  and DM10 of the Core Strategy .
description: Erection of single storey rear extension (5.0m in depth, maximum height of 3.0m and eaves height of 3.0m)
